TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DefaultValueAttribute extends System.Attribute

span.span: Specifies the default value for a property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以建立與任何值。You can create a with any value. 成員的預設值通常為其初始值。A member's default value is typically its initial value. 視覺化設計工具可以使用預設值來重設該成員的值。A visual designer can use the default value to reset the member's value. 程式碼產生器也可以使用預設值來決定成員是否應該產生程式碼。Code generators can use the default values also to determine whether code should be generated for the member. > [!NOTE] > A不會導致成員，才能使用該屬性的值時，會自動初始化。A will not cause a member to be automatically initialized with the attribute's value. 您必須在程式碼中設定的初始值。You must set the initial value in your code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會設定的預設值`MyProperty`至`false`。The following example sets the default value of `MyProperty` to `false`. [!code-cpp[Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下一個範例會檢查的預設值`MyProperty`。The next example checks the default value of `MyProperty`. 程式碼會先取得含有物件的所有屬性。First the code gets a with all the properties for the object. 其索引至的下一步以取得`MyProperty`。Next it indexes into the to get `MyProperty`. 然後它會傳回這個屬性的屬性，並將它們儲存於屬性變數。Then it returns the attributes for this property and saves them in the attributes variable. 然後藉由擷取列印預設值的範例從，和其名稱寫入至主控台畫面。The example then prints the default value by retrieving the from the , and writing its name to the console screen. [!code-cpp[Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DefaultValueAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#2)]
